timeline.message: shorthand properties no longer override longhand properties
removed jump statements from finally blocks
added generic font family to css

timeline.bodyText: Whats up with all these getUTags replacements? That doesn't look to be a real method...
timeline.author: cygnus-x-1
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -100,7 +100,7 @@ public PluginReport addPluginReport(Plugin plugin) {
      * tags recognized by this GraphReport.
      *
      * @param pluginReport the specified PluginReport.
-     * @see GraphReport#getTags()
+     * @see GraphReport#getUTags()

replies.bodyText:
I think your correct, getUtags doesn't seem to exist.
It would be good to get clarity for the reason behind this change. What is the SQ rule @antares1470 ?
Also if we are going to rename methods can you please update CHANGELOG.md @antares1470 ?
replies.author: arcturus2

replies.bodyText: @arcturus2 @cygnus-x-1 check out line 127. The sonar rule was about ensuring that the names of getter functions matched the field they were getting. In this case, there is a field called tags and a field called uTags (the unmodifiable version of tags) and so with the function getTags returning uTags rather than tags, the sonar rule flagged.
replies.author: antares1470

replies.bodyText: I don't like this change - the whole uVariable convention seems silly to me. I get and support using modifiable collections where they are not expected to ever change, but why duplicate the variables and store them both in memory? I'd just set variable to the unmodifiable collection - thoughts @arcturus2?
replies.author: cygnus-x-1
arcturus2

replies.bodyText: @arcturus2 @cygnus-x-1 What is the preference then for this change?
replies.author: antares1470

replies.bodyText: As I understand it, this pattern is only used where lazy loading happens, and the objects loaded never change after that - so thread safety and additions are non-issues.
replies.author: cygnus-x-1

replies.bodyText: @cygnus-x-1 so do you mean to say tags won't change after Constellation opens? That's not my understanding though - I thought tags will continue to get added as different plugins run which append respective tags to that ArrayList.
replies.author: arcturus2

timeline.message: fixed merge conflict, added request changelog entry
